column1: This dataset contains structured feedback collected from students in the
form of numerical ratings across multiple teaching and course-related parameters.
Each row represents feedback from one student.

- Strong subject knowledge often aligns with higher overall satisfaction
- Clear explanations and doubt-solving significantly impact student ratings
- Poor course structuring is a common factor in lower satisfaction scores
- SQL and Python together provide better validation of insights
